CustomField.description: Contact that is associated with the lead. (i.e. Advisor, Lead Referrer, etc). This field will be used to link advisors and people who refer leads to Ubiquity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contact that is associated with the lead. (i.e. Advisor, Lead Referrer, etc). This field will be used to link advisors and people who refer leads to Ubiquity.
CustomField.label: Associated Contact
